import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Start a Host Scan</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/api/v32.04/hosts/scan"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"monitorHosts","saas":true,"self-hosted":true}
x-public: true
```



Re-scan all hosts immediately.

Refer to the following example command that forces Prisma Cloud Compute to re-scan all hosts:

```bash
$ curl -k \
  -u <USER> \
  -X POST \
  https://<CONSOLE>/api/v<VERSION>/hosts/scan
```


<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

OK

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"default"} value={"default"}><div></div><div></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
